column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////So disappointing. The stellar Yelp reviews and 90-minute wait led us to believe that Wildberry would be superior to IHOP
column3: etc. I ordered the cinnamon roll pancakes
column4: which turned out to be a stack of 6 plain pancakes
column5: with a little cinnamon/sugar swirled on the top one
column6: and nothing at all on the remaining 5. My friends ordered the caramel apple pecan pancakes
column7: which were much the same. The service was quick and pleasant
column8: but the food isn't worth a return visit.
